text: 1. Let r be the vector field r = zi +yj + zk and let 7 be the function r = |r|. Let a be the constant vector a = a4+ aj + az k. Compute and simplify the following quantities. Answers must be expressed in terms of a, r, and r. There should be no z’s, y's, or 2’s in your answers. (a) V-r (b) V() (c) Vx(rxa) (@) V- (V(r)
